verbose_text: Likewise, application of HOAsp (400 muM) to inhibit endogenous serine racemase, which synthesizes d-serine from l-serine, increased the frequency of rhythmic bursting (77.9 +/- 21.3%; XREF_FIG, D and E; P < 0.01, n = 6) without affecting amplitude (XREF_FIG, D and F; P> 0.05, n = 6).
evidence: HOAsp (400 muM)                            to inhibit endogenous serine racemase, which synthesizes d-serine
